global-settings.title: Global settings
global-settings.subtitle: Change user interface and view settings
global-settings.filter-reset-description: If this setting is activated, all filters set will be automatically reset after a table change.
global-settings.columns-reset-description: If this setting is activated, all hidden columns will be displayed again after a table change.
global-settings.sorting-reset-description: If this setting is activated, all sorting settings are automatically reset when the table changes.
global-settings.sorting-desc-label: Show latest entries at the top
global-settings.sorting-desc-description: If this setting is activated, the latest table entries are displayed at the top.
